amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $2 million to the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms for law enforcement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete $2 million in funding for in transit relief for certain rifle importers and increase ATF law enforcement funding by $2 million.

action.text: On agreeing to the Schumer amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 301 (Roll No. 286).
